e.Facades

Class CompanyFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • e.Facades.CompanyFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponClientFacade

    public class CompanyFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade
    A Facade which contains all methods that can be executed by the COMPANY user. Any instance represents a single company, that can execute the methods by this object, whose given by the login method when correct parameters are given to it.
    This class implements CouponClientFacade. The Company Facade is part of the Facades layer which enables the users to handle their information.

    • Method Detail

      • login

        public static CompanyFacade login(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String Password)
                           throws DAOException
        Only by login with correct parameters you can get a CompanyFacade object.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the company.
        Password - The password of the company.
        Returns:
        Company with these parameters if exists.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When company with the given parameters does not exists.

      • creatCoupon

        public void creatCoupon(Coupon coupon)
                 throws DAOException
        Create coupon (id and title must be NOT NULL and UNIQUE).
        Parameters:
        coupon - The coupon object.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When a coupon with the same id or name already exist, or creation failed.

      • removeCoupon

        public void removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
                  throws DAOException
        Delete coupon from all tables of DB.
        Parameters:
        coupon - The coupon to delete .
        Throws:
        DAOException - When coupon with the given ID doesn't exist on database, or connection failed.

      • updateCoupon

        public void updateCoupon(long id,
                         java.sql.Date endDate,
                         double price)
                  throws DAOException
        Update coupon attributes on database, according to given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the coupon to update.
        endDate - The expiration date to update the coupon with.
        price - The price to update the coupon with.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When coupon with the given ID doesn't exist on database, or connection failed.

        Returns:

      • getCouponsByType

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByType(CouponType type)
                                              throws DAOException
        Get all coupons of the current company, matching a specific coupon type.
        Parameters:
        type - The coupon type to filter coupons by, must be from the Enum CouponType.
        Returns:
        A collection of coupons owned by current company, matching the given coupon type.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection failed.

      • getCouponsWithMaxPrice

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsWithMaxPrice(double maxPrice)
                                                    throws DAOException
        Get all coupons of the current company, which their price is under or equals a specific price.
        Parameters:
        maxPrice - The maximum price of which to filter coupon by.
        Returns:
        A collection of coupons owned by current company, with price which doesn't exceeds the given maximum price.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection failed.

      • getCouponsWithMaxEndDate

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsWithMaxEndDate(java.sql.Date maxEndDate)
                                                      throws DAOException
        Get all coupons of the current company, which their expiration date is before or exactly a given date.
        Parameters:
        maxEndDate - The latest date of which to filter coupon by.
        Returns:
        A collection of coupons owned by current company, with expiration date which is before or exactly the given date.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection failed.
